titleStmt.title: The case of the Honourable William Ward Esq; son and heir apparent of the Right Honourable Edward Lord Ward, John Levett, Gent., and Mary his wife: humbly offered to the consideration of the Right Honourable the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled.
titleStmt.author: Ward, William, Esq., fl. 1679.

notesStmt.note: An appeal to the House of Lords about the case regarding the inheritance of Sir Thomas Brereton disputed between William Ward, John Levett &c. on the one hand and John Brereton and Nathaniel Booth on the other hand.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
